item.title: Did Terrence J and Rocsi From 106 & Park Ever Date?
item.description: Terrence J and Rocsi Diaz Were Subject to Dating Rumors During Their Time on '106 & Park'The former co-hosts have always maintained they had a close relationship while they co-hosted BET's '106 & Park.' By Elizabeth RandolphFeb. 27 2024, Published 6:32 p.m. ET I don't want to "back in my day" you all to death, but I would be lying if I said I didn't miss video countdown shows. A significant part of my preteen years were spent in front of the TV, wondering which competing video would make the number one spot.

item.title: Failure To Organise Convention In June Will Spell Doom For APC
item.description: The Director-General of the Progressives Governors’ Forum, Salihu Lukman, on Monday, said failure to organise the national convention of the All Progressives Congres in June would spell doom for the party. The tenure of the Caretaker/Extraordinary Convention Planning Committee’s led by Governor Mai Mala Buni would end in June when a national convention is expected to hold. There are speculations that the convention would be shifted and the tenure of the committee would be extended for the second time.

item.title: Tinubu, Shettima Dragged For Insulting Millions Of Christians
item.description: The Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria, (HURIWA) has fumed at the All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential candidate, Bola Tinubu for allegedly hiring ‘fake clerics’ to the unveiling of his running mate, Kashim Shettima. HURIWA’s National Coordinator, Emmanuel Onwubiko, in a statement, said Tinubu and Shettima insulted millions of Nigerians with such acts of blasphemy. The group said Nigeria would have been on fire if Christain-Christain presidential hopefuls had recruited fake imams to portray public acceptance.

item.title: Victoria Beckham - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Known as Posh Spice, Beckham is a former Spice Girl who has released several top-ten UK singles during her solo career, including "Out of Your Mind." She was joined in the Spice Girls by Geri Estelle Halliwell, Melanie Janine Brown, Emma Lee Bunton and Melanie Jayne Chisholm.  Before Fame Her father would drop her off at school in his Rolls Royce, and other children would throw rocks at her. She went on to join the band Persuasion.

item.title: 'Knives Out' Filmmaker Rian Johnson Confirmed Detective Benoit Blanc's Sexuality
item.description: Wait, is Benoit Blanc gay? Ahead of 'Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery,' writer-director Rian Johnson confirmed the fictional detective's sexuality. Source: NetflixSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery. Following the success of Knives Out, writer-director Rian Johnson decided to kickstart a franchise that features Benoit Blanc (Daniel Craig) investigating further mysteries. Luckily, the treasured fictional detective's next adventure, Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery, is finally here and ready to raise the stakes with one jaw-dropping murder mystery.

item.title: Blaire Whites bio: age, height, fiance, transition, net worth
item.description: Blaire White is a well-known YouTube star, political commentator, and businesswoman. She is also a proud trans woman who is very vocal about her thoughts and opinions about various social issues. Experiencing gender dysphoria is something that a large percentage of people cannot relate to, but Blaire White has gone through it. Today, she is proud of her journey so far and is not ashamed to speak about her experiences as a transgender woman.

item.title: Kiatu BBI kinamfinya Moses Kuria, adai uchawi wa Raila umemfanya Uhuru kuwa kipofu
item.description: - Kuria anasema serikali ya Jubilee ilianza kupuuza amri ya mahakama baada ya Raila kuanza kufanya kazi pamoja na Uhuru -Anadai kwamba Raila anatumia uchawi kumfanya Rais kutotii amri - Mbunge huyo alikamatwa mnamo Ijumaa lakini aliwachiliwa huru siku iliyofuata licha ya mahakma kumkabithi dhamana siku ya Ijumaa Mbunge wa Gatundu Kusini Moses Kuria amedai kwamba ukaidi wa serikali umechangiwa na kiongozi wa ODM Raila Odinga. Akizungumza mnamo Jumapili, Januari 12, katika Kaunti ya Uasin Gishu, Kuria alisema katika miaka ya awali, serikali imekuwa ikifuata amri ya mahakama lakini hayo yalibadilika baada ya maafikiano kati ya Rais Uhuru Kenyatta na Raila.

item.title: Christian Martyn - Edad, Familia, Biografa
Small-Scale Businesses To Get Funds In Tune Of N234 Billion
item.description: The Development Bank of Nigeria has raised N23bn bond at 14.40 per cent due in 2028 for small scale businesses. According to the bank, its core corporate objective is to use the N23bn to expand its capacity to provide funding for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises. The Managing Director DBN, Tony Okpanachi, while speaking at the signing ceremony on Thursday in Lagos, said that this was the bank’s first local raise since it began to raise funds.

item.title: TikToker Gets Caught in $1,000 NYC Airbnb Scam
item.description: TikToker Moves to NYC Only to Realize Airbnb He Rented Was Already OccupiedBy Mustafa GatollariPublished Sept. 28 2022, 1:53 p.m. ET Source: GettyReal estate scams are unfortunately a common occurrence in the property game, and folks who are looking for a place to stay, whether temporarily or long-term, have probably come across a few in the search for housing. And we're not just talking about the fact that corporations are buying up housing, or that Zillow has been accused of artificially driving up the prices of homes, either.

item.title: We Will Reject Any Plan To Deny Igbo Presidency Ohanaeze
item.description: The pan Igbo socio-political organization, Ohanaeze Ndigbo, says it will reject any plan to deny the South East the chance to produce the next President in 2023. Naija News reports that the organisation made this known in a communique released after addressing the Imeobi Ohanaeze Ndigbo at its National Secretariat in Enugu State. In the communique read by its President-General, George Obiozor, Ohanaeze warned southeast presidential aspirants against accepting the Vice Presidential slot of their political parties.

item.title: Ayade: PDP Will Reclaim Cross River, Dominate South-South
item.description: The South-South zonal chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Chief Dan Orbih, has vowed that the now opposition party would reclaim Cross River from the All Progressives Congress (APC). Orbih, the former Edo PDP Chairman, stated this while reacting to the recent defection of Governor Ben Ayade to the APC. Giving reasons for his defection, Ayade had highlighted the character attributes of President Muhammadu Buhari and the realisation that Cross River, which has been emasculated economically following the ceding of its oil wells, needed to be in sync with the party at the centre.

item.title: Macy Gray - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Grammy Award-nominated soul singer and occasional actor, known internationally for her song "I Try" from the album On How Life Is. Before Fame She used to not care for her own voice and intended to write songs for others, partnering up with Joe Solo before getting signed to Atlantic Records. Trivia She sold nine million albums worldwide between her first two albums, On How Life Is in 1999 and The Id in 2001.

item.title: PDP Wins First Polling Unit In Osun Election
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) and its governorship candidate in Osun State, Ademola Adeleke has won its first polling unit in the ongoing governorship election in the state. officials of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) declared the result of the polling unit in Osun State, on Saturday. Senator Adeleke of the PDP gathered 47 votes at Polling Unit 05, Ward 07 in Ilesa West Local Government Area, while the state Governor and the candidate of the All Progressives Congress, Gboyega Oyetola polled 17 votes.

item.title: sadboybeanie - Age, Family, Bio
Chadtronic's Wife, Missytronic, Often Appears in His Twitch Videos
item.description: Twitch Fans Love Seeing Chadtronic's Wife on His ChannelBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated June 19 2020, 2:11 p.m. ET Source: TwitterChadtronic may have made his bones streaming content on YouTube, but he's also amassed quite the following on Twitch. He's a Pokemon enthusiast with a dedicated channel to all things Poke-related, not to mention his broadcasts of Pokemon gaming sessions on Twitch to boot. Longtime fans of the star have also been delighted whenever his wife, aka Missytronic, drops in to play with him.

item.title: Date For Super Eagles Vs Guinea 2023 AFCON Prep-Match Revealed
item.description: Super Eagles will play a friendly match against Guinea in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, on Monday as part of their preparations for the 2023 AFCON. The Super Eagles have been in the UAE since January 2, preparing for the 34th edition of the 2023 AFCON which will take place in Ivory Coast from January 13 to February 11, 2024. Guinea are one of the six 2023 AFCON teams camping in the Middle East in preparation for the tournament.

item.title: Fatherkels - Age, Family, Bio
Yasser Al-Qahtani - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Striker who became captain of the Saudi Arabian national team after debuted for them in 2002; he also played for Al-Hilal in the Saudi Premier League. Before Fame He played youth soccer for Al-Qadisiya from 2000 to 2003. Trivia He played for Al Ain from 2011 to 2012. Family Life He grew up in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Associated With He played in the 2006 FIFA World Cup, which was won by Gianluigi Buffon and the Italians.

item.title: 2023 Presidency: Lawan Reassures Tinubu
item.description: Senate president, Ahmad Lawan has reassured APC chieftain, Bola Ahmed Tinubu that the APC will once again hold the presidential mantle in 2023. Lawan said this while receiving Tinubu in Abuja. Tinubu had visited the APC Senate Caucus to seek their support for his Presidential ambition. Welcoming him, Lawan said: “2023, Your Excellency, by the Grace of God, will be a year for APC in Nigeria again.” He also praised the chieftain for taking into cognizance the importance of the party’s Senate Caucus in the upcoming election.

item.title: Benedict Arnold - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: America's most famous traitor during the Revolutionary War. After beginning his military career with the American Continental Army, he joined forces with the opposing British Army. Before Fame In his youth, he worked as an apothecary's apprentice and as a shipping merchant. Trivia Before defecting to the British Army, he helped the Continental Army earn key victories at Fort Ticonderoga and Saratoga. Family Life He married Margaret Mansfield, the daughter of the sheriff of New Haven, Connecticut, in February of 1767.

item.title: Billie Eilish Explains Why "All Lives Matter" Is Wrong and Damaging to Black Lives Matter
item.description: Billie Eilish took to Instagram to explain why "All Lives Matter" is wrong and damaging to the "Black Lives Matter" movement. Source: Jeff Kravitz/FilmMagicThe death of George Floyd has led to Black Lives Matter protests all around the globe. Obviously, there's been protests in the United States, but they've also spread to New Zealand, the United Kingdom, and Germany. But with the movement making headlines and taking over social media, there's also been a resurgence of the "

item.title: Fans Start 'Santa Clarita Diet' Season 4 Petition Following Cancellation
item.description: Get all of the details on why Netflix canceled the 'Santa Clarita Diet' after three seasons, plus, fans petition on Twitter for a Season 4 after that cliffhanger. Source: Saeed Adyani / NetflixSadly, the Netflix series the Santa Clarita Diet got the ax. The “zom-com” original show follows Sheila Hammond (played by Drew Barrymore) who had a bad case of food poisoning and eventually became a zombie. While she still maintains her thoughts and emotions, Sheila has acquired a certain taste for human flesh.

item.title: Is 'Minecraft Legends' Free to Play?
item.description: 'Minecraft Legends' is the latest game from Mojang, which puts an action-strategy spin on the usual blocky formula. But is 'Minecraft Legends' free to play? After plenty of hype, Minecraft Legends is now available on console and PC. The game puts a heavy emphasis on tactical combat and fast-paced action, although your screen will still be graced by Minecraft's iconic, blocky graphics as you set out on an epic new adventure.

item.title: Nisha Guragain - Age, Family, Bio
Vin Diesel - Age, Family, Bio
Irina Dreyt - Age, Family, Bio
NMS replaces Nairobi sweepers with high-tech machines
item.description: - Though the high-tech machines will reduce human labour, all the affected individuals will be deployed elsewhere - The NMS said major cities around the world were using the road sweepers to reduce reliance on human labour - It said the road sweepers will reduce the risk of exposure to the labour force during the COVID-19 pandemic and beyond PAY ATTENTION: Don't miss trending Kenyan news. Follow TUKO.co.ke on Twitter!

item.title: UoN suspends self-sponsored programmes: What you should know
item.description: The streets of the internet recently plunged into panic mode with revelations that one of the top universities in the country was scraping away parallel courses. That headlines were screaming "UoN suspends self-sponsored programmes." Such a development had been cooking for a long time with the Education Cabinet Secretary (CS) hinting earlier that reforms in this sector were imminent and inevitable. While the university was doing away with the body in charge of self-sponsored programmes, the actual services offered by the programme will not be affected as they will be taken over by the mainstream organs of the institution.

item.title: Wenyeji wa magari ya usafiri ya umma watangaza kuongezwa kwa nauli
item.description: - Wenye magari ya umma wametangaza kuongezwa kwa nauli baada ya serikali kuongeza bei ya mafuta - Wameahidi kupunguza nauli iwapo serikali itapunguza ushuru - Mwenyekiti wa chama cha Matatu Simon Kimutai amewataka wasafiri kukubaliana na hatua hii ya kupandisha nauli Wenyeji wa magari ya usafiri ya umma wamewataka abiria wotte kukubaliana na hatua mpya kuongeza nauli kufuatia kuongezwa mafuta ya peroli kwa asilimia kubwa. Habari Nyingine: Huyu ndiye afisa wa polisi mwenye macho na shepu maridadi zaidi Kenya?

item.title: Darren Collison - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Speedy NBA point guard who was traded to the Dallas Mavericks from the Indiana Pacers during the 2012 off-season. Before Fame He played four years at UCLA, earning All-American honors his senior year. Trivia He had one of his best statistical seasons in 2011, when he averaged 13 points and 5 assists a game with the Indiana Pacers. Family Life He is the son of top-ranked international sprinters June Griffith and Dennis Collison.

item.title: Lawmakers In Dark Over President Tinubus Ministerial List As Lagos, 20 Others Yet To Swear-in Com
item.description: With barely six days to the deadline set by the Nigerian constitution, the Bola Ahmed Tinubu-led administration and 21 out of 28 states nationwide have yet to swear in their ministers and commissioners, respectively. Naija News reports that according to the constitution, the president and state governors have until July 27 to send the list of ministers and commissioners to the Senate and various Houses of Assembly, whose confirmation they must get before their swearing-in.

item.title: PDP Fixes Date To Hold Presidential Campaign Rally In Gombe
item.description: The opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has fixed Monday, November 21 for its presidential campaign rally in Gombe State. Naija News reports that the Director General of the PDP Presidential Campaign Organisation and Governor of Sokoto State, Aminu Tambuwal, made this in a statement on Sunday. Tambuwal disclosed that the campaign rally would hold at the Gombe township stadium in Gombe by 11 am. The Sokoto governor invited elected PDP Governors, members of the National Working Committee, National Assembly members, and National Executive Committee (NEC) members to the rally.

item.title: SK Macharia Undergoes Cleansing to Reverse Curse Pronounced on Him by Kikuyu Elders
item.description: - The elders kickstarted the event by sanitising their hands in line with the Ministry of Health protocols before proceeding to perform the ceremony that lasted one hour - The ceremony followed a 2017 curse that was spelled on Macharia by a section of Kikuyu elders for supporting Raila Odinga - Macharia's association with Raila sparked a revolt from a section of the public, especially from the Mt Kenya region, who vowed to boycott his TV and Radio stations accusing him of betrayal

item.title: Buhari Appoints New Head Of NDDC Board
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has announced the new head of Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC) on Monday, December 21. [article_adwert] Mrs. Ibim Semenitari, who is the former aide of Minister for Transportation Rotimi Amaechi, received the post of the Managing Director of the commission. Meanwhile, Semenitari is to work in acting capacity waiting the appointment of a functional MD. READ ALSO: President Buhari Appoints Personal Assistant Semenitari, an award-winner journalist and media manager, worked in the communications directorate of the Buhari presidential campaign organisation during the 2015 presidential poll.

item.title: KeNHA yakanusha madai kwamba mvua ndio ilisababisha kuporomoka kwa barabara ya Mai Mahiu
item.description: - Ripoti za hapo awali ziliarifu kuwa barabara ya Mai Mahiu iliporomoka kutokana na mvua kubwa inayoendelea kunyesha katika sehemu mbali mbali za nchi - Hata hivyo, mamlaka inayosimamia barabara kuu nchini, KeNHA, imetangaza kuwa maporomoko hayo yalisababishwa na mlipuko wa volkano katika eneo hilo - Wasafiri walilazimika kutumia barabara mbadala baada ya barabara hiyo kufurika kwa maji Mamlaka inayosimamia barabara kuu nchini, KeNHA imekana madai kwamba kuporomoka kwa barabara ya Mai Mahiu kuelekea Nairobi kulisababishwa na mvua kubwa inayonyesha katika sehemu mbali mbali za nchi.

item.title: Looking to Catch Shiny Beasts in 'Hogwarts Legacy'? Heres How to Find Them
item.description: If you’re trying to figure out how to catch Shiny Beasts in 'Hogwarts Legacy', here’s everything you need to know about the time-consuming tasks. Source: Avalanche SoftwareJ.K. Rowling has made numerous public anti-trans comments, and while she was not directly involved in the creation of Hogwarts Legacy, she is still likely to profit from the title. The highly anticipated Hogwarts Legacy is now available after a brief early access phase, and thousands of players can now freely roam its magical world.

item.title: 'Queer Eye' Transforms Nate McIntyre's Bodyrock Bootcamp in West Philly
item.description: 'Queer Eye' Season 5 Hero Nate McIntyre Is About to Get a Lot More Gym MembersBy Allison CacichUpdated June 5 2020, 1:15 p.m. ET Source: NetflixOn June 5, Netflix dropped Season 5 of Queer Eye, which was shot in the great city of Philadelphia. As viewers watch their way through 10 fantastic episodes, they’ll meet a medical student, a dog groomer, and even a gay Lutheran pastor. But one of our favorite Pennsylvanian heroes is personal trainer Nate McIntyre.

item.title: Paul Butcher - Age, Family, Bio
Robyn Cara - Age, Family, Bio
Why Tinubu Must Sack INEC Chairman
item.description: A former Chairman of the Nigeria Bar Association (NBA), Olisa Agbakoba (SAN) has called on President Bola Ahmed Tinubu to remove the Chairman of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), Professor Mahmood Yakubu. In a statement to Naija News on Thursday, Agbakoba said the failure to remove the INEC Chairman will impede Tinubu’s reform task. The senior lawyer also hailed the president for suspending the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) Governor, Godwin Emefiele, and the Chairman of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, Abdulrasheed Bawa.

item.title: Alfonso Freeman - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Son of actor Morgan Freeman, he appeared in several films that starred his father, including The Shawshank Redemption, The Bucket List, Seven, and Nurse Betty. Before Fame After graduating from Southern California's Compton High School, he briefly attended California State University as an art major. Trivia He appeared on such television series as The West Wing, ER, JAG, and Robot Chicken. Family Life He had three sons with his first wife, Cynthia Gifford.

item.description: Singer, producer and composer who records music alongside his brother Mathan, AKA Havoc Mathan. Before Fame He and Mathan began to record together in 2008. Trivia He earned his diploma in Medical Lab in 2014. Family Life He is younger than Mathan. His parents' are Sooriya Murthi and Alice Indra Ghandhi. item.title: Suspend Campaigns To Honour Flood Victims
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Labour Party, Peter Obi, has appealed to his counterparts in other parties to suspend their campaigns to honour victims of flood across the country. Obi made the appeal during a visit to Governor Samuel Ortom of Benue State at his Abuja private residence to commiserate with him over the flood disaster in his domain. He called on Bola Tinubu of the All Progressives Congress, Atiku Abubakar of the Peoples Democratic Party, and Rabiu Kwankwaso of the New Nigeria Peoples Party, amongst others to join him to help victims of floods in the country.

item.title: UNBELIEVABLE: SEE How Woman Survives Cement Truck Crash On Her Car (PHOTO)
item.description: A 39 year old Chinese woman, Lok Wan, had a miraculous escape after a truck overturned and spilled a full load of wet cement on her car.  *Rescuers at the scene of the accident Rescuer pulled the woman out of the wreckage after the cement crushed her car in Fuzhou, Fujian Province.Amazingly, she was almost unscathed, apart from being covered in cement, after her 40 minute ordeal. The crash happened after Wan and his girlfriend Yin Min Tai, 35, took the wrong entrance to a busy motorway and decided to make a U-turn.

item.title: 2023 Presidency Should Go To North-Central, Saraki Insists
item.description: Former Senate President and 2023 presidential aspirant, Bukola Saraki says it is the turn of the north-central region to produce Nigeria’s next president. He said the region has suffered, sacrificed, and endured a lot for the country and deserves a shot at the presidency. Naija News reports Saraki made the submission on Tuesday in Jos, the Plateau State capital while addressing members of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in the state.

item.title: Charo - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Celebrated singer, dancer, and comedian who has released hits like the 1977 single "Dance A Little Bit Closer." Before Fame She married Xavier Cugat when he was sixty-four in order to legally enter the United States. Trivia Besides her signature catch phrase "cuchi-cuchi," people remember her for her unusual costumes and wild stage presence. Family Life She divorced Xavier Cugat in 1978 and married producer Kjell Rasten in the same year.

item.title: Jade Jolie - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Former contestant and rainbow princess on RuPaul's Drag Race season 5. She is a featured cast member at the performing arts theater Play Louisville and she is also known as America's top Taylor Swift impersonator. Before Fame As a child, she would craft, create designs, play video games, make home music videos to the Spice Girls and re-watch old episodes of Sailor Moon. She began performing in shows when she turned 18 years old. Trivia She was named Miss Jacksonville Beach in 2012.

item.title: Sarah Burgett - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: StyleHaul partner and YouTube beauty guru best known for her channel BeautyPolice101. She has a vlogging channel as well, called VlogPolice101. Before Fame She launched her BeautyPolice101 channel on April 23, 2011 and published her first video the same day. The video is called "Drugstore makeup review." Trivia She used to publish videos with her friends Morgan, Kelly and Haley to the collaborative channel xkeepcalmandpartyonx. Family Life She is from Cincinnati, Ohio.

item.title: Boko Haram Abduct 22 Girls Allegedly For Marriage In Niger State
item.description: Some gun-wielding men suspected to be members of the Boko Haram terrorist group have reportedly whisked away a total of twenty-two young girls in Niger State. The terrorist reportedly stormed Kurebe, a community in the Rafi local government area of Niger State on Thursday and abducted the girls who are said to be between 14 and 17 years. Reports obtained by Naija News alleged that the terror group abducted the teenagers purposely for marriage.

item.title: Grade 4, Class 8 and Form Four learners to resume classes on October 12, CS Magoha announces
item.description: - Schools will reopen on Monday, October 12, and run for 11 weeks until December 23 which will mark the end of the second term - Pupils in Grade Four, Class Eight and KCSE candidates in Form Four will be the first to report back to school - Learners will break for one week and resume classes on January 4, 2021, which will mark the beginning of the third term that will run for 11 weeks

item.title: INEC Officials Desert Uzokwa Ward 3 With 20 PUs
item.description: No electoral official have been reportedly sighted in Abobot Girls Secondary School, Uzokwa Ward 3 of Ihiala Local Government Area of Anambra State. The ward alone, according to reports, has no fewer than 20 Polling Units. Naija News understands that the Uzokwa ward is just a stone throw from the Ihiala Local Government Area Headquarters, yet no staff of the Independent National Electoral Commission has been deployed there to proceed with the last lap of the state governorship election.

item.title: Justin Morales - Age, Family, Bio
Al Nassr Want To Buy Antoine Griezmann For 25 Million
item.description: Saudi Pro League club, Al Nassr, are reportedly ready to sign Atletico Madrid forward Antoine Griezmann even though he still has a contract with his Spanish club. Antoine Griezmann has been associated with Atletico Madrid since he left Real Sociedad for the club on July 28, 2014, for a transfer fee worth €30 million. He left Atletico Madrid for FC Barcelona for a transfer fee worth €120 million on July 14, 2019.

item.title: Are 'Summer House's Kyle and Amanda Still Together? The Couple's Long Engagement, Explained
item.description: 'Summer House' couple Kyle Cooke and Amanda Batula have been engaged for a year and a half. But are they still together today? Details inside! Source: gettyBravo's Summer House couple Kyle Cooke and Amanda Batula have been together for about four years now and engaged for over a year and a half. And while there's nothing wrong with long engagements, they definitely invite many questions from onlookers who wonder whether something's wrong in the relationship and whether the couple is still together.

item.title: Nigerians Need To Acquire Financial Knowledge
item.description: The CEO of Forward Edge Consulting Ltd, Moyosore Kukoyi has stressed the need for Nigerians to acquire Financial Knowledge in order to make smart investment decisions. Mr Kukoyi who is a Public Speaker, Investor, Investment Coach, Real Estate Professional and a Digital Marketing Strategist is currently running a campaign to educate people on the importance of financial knowledge. He was recently at Kigali Rwanda and Istanbul Turkey as a Guest Speaker in a Women Leadership and National Development Conference organized by the Federal Ministry of Women Affairs to deliver lectures on “Tips to Build Generational Wealth”.

item.title: Sam Sheen - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: The oldest daughter of actor Charlie Sheen and Denise Richards, she was born in Los Angeles, California. She is an extremely popular content creator on TikTok, where she's earned over 70,000 fans on her samisheen account by primarily posting lip-sync videos.  Before Fame Her parents met while filming the 2000 movie Good Advice and became romantically involved a year later on the set of Spin City. They married in the summer of 2002 and divorced when Sam was two years old.

item.title: 2023 Presidency: We Will Ensure North Interest Is Protected
item.description: Ahead of the 2023 general elections, the Northern Governors Forum has stated it will ensure that the interest of the region is protected and promoted. Chairman of the forum and Governor of Plateau State, Simon Lalong, stated this on Monday at an emergency meeting of the forum in Kaduna State. Lalong, who spoke before the meeting went into a closed-door session, said the governors would discuss issues relating to the peace, progress and development of the northern people and the nation at large.

item.title: Does Chase Chrisley Have a Job? Everything We Know About His Career
item.description: Real estate mogul Todd Chrisley of 'Chrisley Knows Best' might not be the only star in the family. Fans are wondering if Chase Chrisley has a new job. The Chrisley family of Chrisley Knows Best has always embraced the entrepreneurial spirit, and it appears that the Chrisley children are no exception! The unofficial troublemaker of the show, Chase Chrisley, seems to be growing up and taking responsibility. After the airing of the spinoff series Growing up Chrisley, fans want to know: Does Chase currently have a job?

item.title: Duane Chapman - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Also known as Dog the Bounty Hunter, he tracked down and confronted bail jumpers for eight seasons on his reality TV program. Before Fame He was inspired to become a bounty hunter after serving a stint in prison for a drug-related killing. Trivia He became a bail jumper himself after the Mexican police arrested and imprisoned him. Family Life His son Leland accompanied him on his ill-fated Mexico bounty hunt. He has a total of 12 children and has been married 5 times.

item.title: Why I Annulled June 12 MKO Abiola's Victory
item.description: Former military president of Nigeria, Gen. Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida (IBB) has disclosed the reason for his decision to annul the June 1993 presidential election in Nigeria believed to have been won by Chief Moshood Kashimawo Olawale Abiola. The 1993 election which was expected to transit Nigeria from military rule to democratic rule was suddenly cancelled by IBB before the National Electoral Commission (NEC) could fully announce the results. The reason behind the president’s decision has been shrouded in secrecy ever since but IBB, 28 years later has given an explanation for his action.

item.title: Ahmad Faiz Ariffin - Age, Family, Bio
Jos Feliciano - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Blind Puerto Rican singer-songwriter best known for his international Christmas hit "Feliz Navidad." He has also released covers of songs like "Light My Fire" by The Doors. Before Fame He played the tin cracker can at the age of three with his uncle. When he was seventeen, he left school to play music. Trivia The first instrument he learned to play was the accordion; his father surprised him with a guitar, which he would play for fourteen hours a day.

item.title: Court Orders Emefiele's Release, Nullifies His Detention
item.description: A day after a Federal Capital Territory High Court in Abuja ordered the release of suspended Central Bank of Nigeria Governor, Godwin Emefiele, another court declared his arrest and detention by the Department of State Services (DSS) null and void. Emefiele sought the court’s intervention against the Incorporated Trustees of the Forum for Accountability and Good Leadership, the Attorney General of the Federation, the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC), the Inspector General of Police, the State Security Service, and the Central Bank of Nigeria.

item.title: Fayemi Speaks On Betraying Tinubu
item.description: The Governor of Ekiti State, Kayode Fayemi on Wednesday denied betraying the National Leader of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Tinubu. The Chairman of the Nigerian Governors Forum (NGF) in his statement noted that the office of the President is not an inheritance. This is coming a few hours after Fayemi declared his intention to contest for the presidency under the ruling party in 2023. Fayemi during an interview on Channels TV said the ambition of presidential aspirants in the party is to make a difference in the lives of Nigerians.

item.title: Mali, Burkina Faso Deploy Warplane In Niger Ahead Of ECOWAS Military Invasion
item.description: Burkina Faso and Mali have deployed warplanes in Niger Republic following the threat of the Economic Community of West Africa (ECOWAS) to invade the country. The regional bloc had given Niger junta a one-week ultimatum to reinstate President Mohamed Bazoum or face possible sanctions, including possible military action. But the coup leaders called the bluff of ECOWAS and vowed to resist any military intervention from ECOWAS or any other body.

item.title: Ole Romer - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Danish astronomer who made the first quantitative measurements of the speed of light in 1676. Before Fame He graduated from the Cathedral school of Aarhus in 1662 and then attended the University of Copenhagen. Trivia He was made the Second Chief of the Copenhagen Police in 1705 and remained in the position until his death in 1710. Family Life He was born to merchant and skipper Christen Pedersen and Anna Olufsdatter Storm.

item.title: Who Robbed Kourtney Kardashian? She Suspects It's an Inside Job
item.description: Kourtney Kardashian Suspects Someone on Her Team Robbed Her After Her Cash Goes MissingBy Shannon RaphaelUpdated Feb. 23 2021, 10:39 a.m. ET Source: GettyEven when you're worth tens of millions of dollars, you still notice when your wallet seems a bit lighter, that is, if you're Kourtney Kardashian. She suspected that someone stole from her after attending an event when she noticed that some cash from her wallet went missing.

item.title: Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour Wins Labour Party Gubernatorial Ticket In Lagos
item.description: Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour has emerged as the Lagos State Governorship candidate for the Labour Party (LP) for the 2023 General election. Naija News reports that Rhodes-Vivour scored 111 votes to defeat his opponent Mashood Salvador in the Labour Party substitution primary held on Wednesday in Ikeja, Lagos. Salvador, a former Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) State chairman polled 102 votes. Recall that Rhodes, 39, had last month left the PDP to join the Labour Party to fulfil him ambition of running for the governorship of Lagos State.

item.title: Protest In Ibadan As Amotekun Corps Allegedly Kill Teenager
item.description: Some members of the Southwest Security Network Agency codenamed Operation Amotekun have reportedly killed a teenager in Ibadan, Oyo State. Reports reaching Naija News at this time revealed that the incident happened along the Agodi Secretariat Road in the state capital on Wednesday, August 18. An angry mob in the area has trooped out to protest the killing of the boy who is said to be 15-years-old. The circumstances surrounding the alleged murder were not yet clear at the time of filing this report and the Police is also yet to make any official comment.

item.title: These Regular People Paid More Income Tax Than Donald Trump
item.description: 9-Year-Old and a Baby Are Among Those Who Paid More Taxes Than Donald TrumpBy Robin ZlotnickUpdated Sept. 28 2020, 7:06 p.m. ET Source: Getty Images / TwitterThe New York Times recently released a bombshell report about President Donald Trump's tax returns, including the fact that in 2016 and 2017, he only paid $750 in federal income tax for each entire year. Other revelations include the fact that he paid no income taxes at all for 10 of the past 15 years as well as evidence of massive amounts of debt that he will not likely be able to pay off in the next few years when it's due.

item.title: 2023: Tinubu Is A Tribal Evangelist
item.description: The camp of the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar has described the flagbearer of the All Progressives Congress, Bola Tinubu as a tribal evangelist. The spokesman of the Atiku/Okowa presidential campaign council, Daniel Bwala stated this while reacting to the statement of Tinubu during his meeting with leaders of Afenifere on Sunday. Bwala in a statement released on Monday said the comment of Tinubu that he would bring the trophy home at the meeting is an ethnic insinuation and divisive remark.

item.title: Buhari Showers Praise On Jonathan
item.description: As Nigerians wait to go to the polls for the 2015 elections come March 28 and April 11 respectively, the Presidential candidate of The All Progressives Congress (APC), General Muhammadu Buhari has commended his rival and the incumbent president, Goodluck Jonathan for the first time in a long while. Speaking in Abuja during the visit of Mr. Kadre Ouedraogo, President of The Economic Community Of West African States (ECOWAS), General Buhari praised President Jonathan for assuring Nigerians that he will hand over power if he loses in the forthcoming presidential election slated for March 28.

item.title: Nigerian Govt Lists Four Borders Its Citizens Stuck In Ukraine Can Use To Cross Into Poland
item.description: The federal government of Nigeria on Saturday listed four borders that are recommended for Nigerians trying to escape from war-hit Ukraine. The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Nigerians in Diaspora Commission (NIDCOM), Abike Dabiri-Erewa gave the update in a video posted on her Twitter account amidst the ongoing clash between Russian and Ukrainian military forces. According to her, there may be up to eight borders available but there are four which the government has recommended and would have officials waiting to receive Nigerians on the other end.

item.title: Another Popular Nigerian Actor, Sk Is Dead
item.description: Nigerian Kannywood actor, Sani Garba SK is dead. According to BBC Hausa, Sani Garba died at the Muhammadu Abdullahi Wase Hospital in the Nasarawa area of Kano on Wednesday after a protracted illness. Kannywood producer, Abdul Amart confirmed the death of SK on Wednesday. Amart disclosed that SK spent nearly three years battling illness, but that his condition deteriorated recently. The actor had battled diabetes, which later developed into liver and kidney problem as well as high blood pressure.

item.title: Edmund Husserl - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Continental philosopher and mathematician who pioneered the field of phenomenology. He saw experience as being equal to empiricism. Before Fame He studied mathematics, physics, and astronomy at the University of Leipzig from 1876 until 1878. He was taught by Wilhelm Wundt, a founder of modern psychology, at Leipzig. Trivia His 1891 work Philosophie der Arithmetik. Psychologische und logische Untersuchungen was strongly criticized by Gottlob Frege. Family Life He divorced Malvine Steinschneider in 1901.

item.title: Usain Bolt Says He Is 'Clean' Ahead Of Anniversary Games
item.description: Six-time Olympic sprint champion Usain Bolt insists he is "clean" in the wake of recent failed drugs tests by fellow Jamaican athletes. Compatriots Asafa Powell and Sherone Simpson recently tested positive as did the USA's Tyson Gay, the fastest man in the world this year. Bolt, who will race in Friday's London Anniversary Games, said: "I'm clean. "But you have to be very careful as an athlete because right now there are a lot of things on the banned list.

Source: The Pokemon CompanyIf you're an avid Discord user, chances are you've at least heard of the bot Pokecord. The creative addition to the popular chat client allowed users to invite a bot to their servers to help run a game of Pokemon right within Discord.

item.title: Lalong Writes Catholics, Begs For Forgiveness
item.description: The Governor of Plateau State, Simon Lalong, has written to Catholics, tendering an apology over comments he made referencing Pope Francis. Recall that while defending his decision to accept his appointment as Director-General of the All Progressives Congress Presidential Campaign Council, Lalong had told State House correspondents that as a born, baptised and confirmed Catholic, who has the highest award from the papacy, Knight of Saint Gregory the Great, the Pope has not told him there was anything wrong leading the campaign of a Muslim-Muslim ticket.

item.title: Uhuru-Ruto Reunion: Otiende Amollo Asks Church Leaders to Keep Off Politics, Stop Causing Confusion
item.description: Otiende Amollo faulted the clergy for causing confusion, especially after their move to ban politics in the churches and later seeking to be involved in political affairsHe said the clerics could not show up when they were needed, and thus, their efforts to reconcile President Uhuru Kenyatta and his deputy William Ruto now are dishonestA section of Catholic bishops had offered to pursue a truce between the two leadersRarieda member of parliament Otiende Amollo has poured cold water on the calls for a reunion between President Uhuru Kenyatta and his deputy William Ruto.

item.title: What Is Cancel Culture? It's Not an Easy Topic to Discuss
item.description: What Is Cancel Culture? Ivanka Trump Blames It For Being Dropped as Grad SpeakerBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated June 7 2020, 4:29 p.m. ET Source: Warner Bros.It seems like every single day you log into Twitter, there's a new celebrity, actor, musician, politician, company, or public figure getting canceled. Whether it's for being "transphobic", sexist, or staying silent on a variety of human rights issues, being friends with someone connected to Donald Trump, or engaging in behavior that's harmful or just downright criminal, there's a litany of folks being called out for their behavior online.

item.title: Former CBN Deputy Governor, Others Support Policy On New Naira Notes
item.description: Following the announcement to redesign the N200, N500 and N1000 naira notes by the Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Godwin Emefiele last Wednesday, several reactions have trailed the decision of the apex bank. Some Nigerians have expressed different opinions and thoughts about the new policy. Some have supported the decision of the apex bank saying it is best for the nation’s economy, while others have faulted the policy saying it is not a top priority for the CBN at this time, as other means can be adopted to revive the economy.

item.title: Peter Obi Postpones Campaign Council Inauguration As Consultation Continues
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP), Peter Obi, has reportedly postponed the inauguration of his campaign councils. Naija News reports that the embargo placed on political campaigns by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has been lifted today, September 28, 2022. The Labour Party has not constituted his campaign council as he was said to be making consultations across the country. Speaking to The PUNCH on Tuesday on Obi’s campaign, the National Publicity Secretary of the Labour Party, Abayomi Arabambi disclosed that the party has no plan to host any inauguration.

item.title: Tinubu Promises One Million Jobs In Two Years As APC Holds Talk Show On Manifesto
item.description: The presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu has promised to create one million jobs in the first two years of his government if elected as president at next year’s polls. Naija News reports that former Lagos deputy governor, Femi Pedro gave the promise in Abuja on Thursday at a one-day public symposium theme: “Dissecting the Asiwaju Manifesto – Renewed Hope 2023.” According to him, the pledge by the APC presidential hopeful was contained in his 80-page manifesto titled ‘Renewed Hope.

item.title: 'Payment Of Levies, Taxes In Foreign Currency Not Helping Our Economy'
item.description: The chairman of the Presidential Committee on Tax and Fiscal Policy Reform, Taiwo Oyedele, has suggested that paying taxes and levies in foreign currency was not helping the country’s economy. Speaking on Channels TV’s Sunrise Daily on Friday, Oyedele said that the development was causing more unnecessary demand for forex, insisting that when companies cannot access foreign currencies, they also do not pay on time.  “There’s a requirement for Nigerian companies & businesses to pay some levies and taxes in foreign currency, which is not helping our economy by creating unnecessary demand in the forex market,” Oyedele said.

item.title: Over 3,000 PDP Members Dump Party To Join APC In Yobe
item.description: Yobe State chapter of the ruling All Progressive Congress, APC has received no fewer than three thousand defectors from the opposition Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). The defectors, Naija News understands are all from the Fika Local Government Area area of the state. The politicians were received into the broom party on Tuesday by APC Chairman-elect in the state, Mohammed Gadaka. item.title: Hushpuppi Drops Top US Criminal Defence Attorney
item.description: The alleged cybercriminal, Ramon Abbas, popularly known as Ray Hushpuppi, has dropped his Chicago lawyer, Gal Pissetzky after he was transferred to California. Following his arrest in Dubai, UAE, and extradition to the US, Hushpuppi was arraigned in Chicago. He had hired Pissetzky, a top criminal defence attorney, to defend him in court but the Chicago lawyer could not secure bail for Abbas. Pissetzky who had vowed to prove his client’s innocence, applied for him to leave jail with an electronic tag and live with the uncle of a woman with whom he has a child, but US prosecutors opposed the bail application and the judge refused him bail, saying he might commit more fraud.

item.title: Troops Raids IPOB Manufacturing Factory, Recover Major Firearms
item.description: The Nigerian Army has discovered and dismantled a significant weapons and drone production facility allegedly run by the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), and its militia arm, the Eastern Security Network (ESN) in Onicha Olona, Aniocha South Local Government Area of Delta State. The Director of Army Public Relations, Major General Onyema Nwachukwu, disclosed this information in a press release on Tuesday, March 14th. He disclosed that the combatants were utilizing the factory to execute illicit operations aimed at instilling fear in nearby communities and unsuspecting civilians.

Family Life He married his wife Lynette in Jamaica. They have two daughters named Pleasant and August.

Yoruba traditional wedding attire for bride and groom
item.description: Traditional Yoruba wedding garment is really something that makes weddings in Yorubaland so picturesque and festive-looking. No matter how wealthy the bride and groom are – their attires will be so luxurious that even a king would freely wear them. Let’s take a look at these masterpieces and their specific features. Traditions of making wedding attire in YorubalandFrom the ancient times, there was a special Yoruba cloth for making wedding attires and other formal garments.

item.title: Dele Momodu Reacts As TB Joshua's Daughter Graduates From Columbia Varsity
item.description: Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) chieftain, Dele Momodu has congratulated Promise Joshua, daughter of the late founder of the Synagogue Church of All Nations (SCOAN) Prophet TB Joshua on her graduation from Columbia University. Naija News earlier reported that Promise Joshua recently earned a master’s degree in public administration (MPA) in the US-based varsity. Momodu, who remains close to Joshua’s family following his relationship with the deceased clergyman, shared videos and photos of Ms Joshua during the graduation ceremony on Instagram.

item.title: FRSC Launches Body Cameras For Patrol Operations
item.description: The operations of the men of the Federal Road Safety Corps (FRSC) across the country will now be monitored with the help of body cameras. FRSC Corps Marshal, Boboye Oyeyemi, made this known on Thursday during the launch of the body cameras at an event in Abuja. Oyeyemi, who also unveiled the operation monitoring and control platform alongside the cameras, stated that the new move will reduce the inducement of officials and the likelihood of escaping arrest.

item.title: James Cook (Explorer) - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: British explorer who mapped the South Pacific, including Australia's eastern coastline and Hawaii. He also completed the first recorded expedition around New Zealand. Before Fame He spent three years in a merchant navy apprenticeship, studying mathematics and astronomy. Trivia His life ended when he attempted his second voyage to Hawaii. Family Life He married his mentor's daughter, Elizabeth Batts, in 1762 and he had six children. Associated With William Penn's father was also a member of the Royal Navy.

item.title: Narok: Kijogoo afyonza hela za mahari na visura
item.description: Nusra buda mmoja wa eneo la Ng'aram kaunti ya Narok amtandike mwanawe mwanawe baada ya kugundua jamaaa alitumia pesa alizompa kulipa mahari kuponda raha. Inasemekana jamaa alikuwa akiandamwa na wakwe zake waliomtaka alipe mahari haraka iwezekanavyo baada ya kumchukua binti yao. Habari Nyingine: Raila awataka wabunge waliopatwa na virusi vya corona kujitokeza Kulingana na ripoti ya Taifa Leo, familia yake iliandaa kikao na baada ya mashauriano ya muda, iliamuliwa jamaa apewe KSh 50,000 ili kupunguza presha la deni hilo.

item.title: Details on 'Euphoria' Star's Folks
item.description: 'Euphoria' alum and 'Nope' star Barbie Ferreira opened up about her mom and dad as well as her upbringing on Dax Shepard's podcast. By Jamie LeeApr. 5 2023, Published 4:54 p.m. ET Kat Hernandez was easily a fan favorite when Euphoria aired its first season back in 2019. The character, played by Barbie Ferreira, went on a roller-coaster journey of self-discovery that resonated with viewers. So, naturally, the world was sad to hear about her post–Season 2 exit — which Barbie recently opened up about on the Armchair Expert With Dax Shepard podcast.

item.title: Hoodlums Attack Police Division, Kidnap DCO In Abuja
item.description: A group of unknown gunmen have abducted the Divisional Crime Officer of the Dawaki Police Division on Thursday during an attack on the station located in the suburb bordering Gwarimpa in Abuja. Naija News learnt that the DCO whose identity is yet to be ascertained was subsequently released by the hoodlums who invaded the division. Trouble started when, after security operatives attempted to arrest a motorcyclist who rode his bike to the Kubwa expressway in violation of the ban on commercial motorcycles on the highway.

item.title: Sergio Ramos - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Spanish defender who became a longtime fixture of Real Madrid and Spain's national team, joining both squads in 2005. He helped Spain with the World Cup Championship in 2010. Before Fame He began his youth career with Sevilla in 1996, at age ten.  Trivia He was named the La Liga Best Defender four consecutive years from 2012 to 2015. Family Life He was raised with two siblings, Mirian and Rene. His father's name is Jose.

item.title: Should You Use Gardevoir or Gallade in Pokmon GO? Answered
item.description: In 'Pokémon GO,' Ralts is a unique Pokémon that can evolve into Gardevoir or Gallade. You can choose one or the other, but it can be hard a decision. The gist: Trainers are convinced that Gardevoir is a much better evolution pick than Gallade.Some believe "it depends" on what you need. Gardevoir is a good Fairy-type attacker and Gallade specializes in Fighting-type moves.According to Trainers, Gallade is outclassed by other Fighting-types like Lucario, meaning it's more worth going for Gardevoir in the long run.

item.title: Steve Carell - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known for his role as the attention-starved boss Michael Scott in the NBC series The Office, he first became known to TV audiences as a correspondent on The Daily Show from 1999 to 2005. He had his big screen breakthrough in the 2005 film The 40-Year-Old Virgin. Other film credits include Bruce Almighty, Little Miss Sunshine, Anchorman and Beautiful Boy.  Before Fame He grew up with three older brothers and worked as a mail carrier before joining a children's theater company.

item.title: After Twitter Ban, President Buhari Makes Fresh Appointment
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has approved the appointment of Balarabe Shehu Ilelah as the new Director-General of the National Broadcasting Commission (NBC). The Minister of Information and Culture, Alhaji Lai Mohammed, announced the appointment in a statement issued in Abuja on Friday. Naija News reports that this was made known by Segun Adeyemi, Special Assistant To The President (Media), Office of the Minister of Information and Culture. Mr. Ilelah’s appointment is for a tenure of five years in the first instance.

item.title: Does Derek Chauvin Have Kids? Details About the Convicted Ex-Cop
item.description: Does Derek Chauvin Have Any Kids? The Convicted Murderer's Family, ExplainedBy Michelle SteinJun. 25 2021, Updated 4:03 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIn the wake of former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin having been found guilty on two charges of murder and one charge of manslaughter in the May 25, 2020 death of George Floyd, the nation has breathed a collective sigh of relief. It's a step in the right direction toward battling police brutality and holding officers accountable for killing people, for sure.

item.title: Woman Swallows Her Engagement Ring in a Dream and In Real Life
item.description: Jenna Evans had a dream that she swallowed her engagement ring to protect it from bad guys. When she woke up, she actually had swallowed it. Source: FacebookJenna Evans was traveling with her fiancé Bobby. They were "in a very sketchy situation involving a high speed train and bad guys," and Bobby told her she had to swallow her ring to protect it. So, she "popped that sucker off," put it in her mouth and swallowed it with a glass of water that happened to be there.

item.title: Restarting Your 'New Horizons' Island Is a Cathartic Experience That Comes at a Cost

In addition to new items and new villagers, we'll also be getting the option to cook and grow food and a new DLC.

item.description: Here's What We Know About the Future of 'The Morning Show'By Chris BarillaPublished Nov. 19 2021, 2:07 p.m. ET Source: Apple TV+Though it has only been on the air for two seasons so far, The Morning Show has quickly become one of the most valuable programs in the Apple TV Plus catalog. The star-studded cast, which includes names like Jennifer Aniston and Steve Carell, has worked tremendously well together so far and won a slew of awards.

item.title: Knocks As Wike Sings, Dances To Tinubu's Campaign Song
item.description: Some Nigerians have slammed the Minister of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Nyesom Wike, after a video emerged showing him singing and dancing to the campaign song of President Bola Tinubu. Naija News reports that the former Governor of Rivers State was filmed singing in the office of Tinubu’s chief of staff, Femi Gbajabiamila, while showing support for the president. Wike could be heard chanting, “Jagaban on your mandate we shall stand.

item.title: The Cole Carrigan Drama Began Far Before the Ace Family Details
item.description: Cole Carrigan Was No Stranger to Controversy Before He Posted His Ace Family VideoBy Shannon RaphaelUpdated July 27 2020, 11:31 a.m. ET Source: InstagramCole Carrigan started quite the drama when he released a video on Oct. 14 that accused Ace Family patriarch Austin McBroom of rape. The shocking video caused amedia storm, and Austin soon went on the defense trying to clear his name and reputation. Screenshots, legal information, and name-calling flew between Austin and Cole online, and it doesn't seem like there's an end in sight for the scandal.

item.title: The Evidence Is Trending On Social Media
item.description: The United Kingdom Chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) has said that the presidential candidate of the party, Bola Ahmed Tinubu is hale and hearty. Chairman of the APC, UK Presidential Campaign Council (PCC), Joseph Adebola, said this in a statement on Thursday. He stated that reports of the APC flag bearer travelling abroad to seek medical assistance were untrue. He explained that his principal has been having strategic meetings with some party stakeholders in the UK.

item.title: Why There Is High Rate Of Divorce
item.description: The General Overseer of Salvation Ministry, David Ibiyeomie, on Sunday stated that there is a high rate of divorce across the world. According to Ibiyeomie, the high rate of divorce is due to the ideology of couples before they enter into marriage. The cleric while preaching in his church’s headquarters in Port Harcourt said some people go into marriage with divorce in mind as an alternative when things go wrong.

Before Fame She was previously active on social media before posting her first picture to her giselleg__ account in September of 2015. Trivia She has earned over 120,000 followers on Instagram. Her giselleg__ TikTok account has become widely popular, earning a fanbase of over 20,000 followers. She uses the platform to share beauty and makeup videos with her fanbase, as well as vlogs from her personal life.

item.title: Many Feared Dead As Herdsmen Attack Catholic Church In Gov Akeredolu's Hometown
item.description: There was pandemonium on Sunday when herdsmen attacked a church in Owo, Ondo state killing over 50 people. Speaking to Sunday Tribune, a source, who explained that some herdsmen invaded the church during service, opened fire on the members of the church and killed no fewer than 50 people, explained that the congregation were caught unaware. The source stated the casualty might be more as some worshippers who were taken to the hospital have given up.

item.title: Protest Rocks Plateau Over Sack Of Governor Mutfwang By Appeal Court
item.description: Massive protests broke out in Jos, the capital of Plateau State, on Sunday, in response to the triumph of the All Progressives Congress (APC) gubernatorial candidate, Dr. Nentawe Yilwatda, over Governor Caleb Mutfwang of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) at the Court of Appeal in Abuja. Naija News reported that the Appellant Court had, in a unanimous judgement, nullified the election of Governor Mutfwang over the PDP’s lack of structure and non-obedience of a Court order at the time of his nomination for the March 18 governorship election in the State.

item.title: Woman Fired From Walmart After 16 Years Because of TikTok, She Says
item.description: A Woman Was Fired From Walmart After 16 Years Because of a TikTokBy Callie (Carlos) CadornigaUpdated April 11 2023, 5:22 p.m. ET Source: TikTok/@stephunleashedPlatforms like TikTok are no strangers to their users sharing disturbing insider information on some of the harshest industries. A Domino's delivery driver posts constantly about the tips she receives (or doesn't receive) on her various shifts. An Instacart shopper recently put a customer on blast for trying to illicit a refund under false pretenses for a ridiculously large order.

item.title: 2023: NNPP Presidential Candidate, Kwankwaso Betrayed Me
item.description: Former Governor of Kano State, Ibrahim Shekarau has accused the presidential candidate of the New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP), Rabiu Kwankwaso of betrayal. Shekarau made this claim days after dumping the NNPP for the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) ahead of the 2023 general elections. The lawmaker representing Kano Central district during an interview on Channels TV disclosed that Kwankwaso refused to implement the agreement they had. According to Shekarau, he had asked Kwankwaso to present his loyalists with political slots, but the presidential candidate refused to take steps till the Independent National Electoral Commission closed receiving candidates.

item.title: Gabi Butler - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: All-star cheerleading athlete who was featured in the Netflix docuseries Cheer, as well as on the Awesomeness TV series Cheerleaders and the YouTube series Cheer Full Out. She has been in the public eye as an athlete and cheerleader since she was a young girl and has earned significant followings on such social platforms as YouTube, Instagram and TikTok.  Before Fame She has been cheering since she was 8 years old and became well known for her flexibility as a flyer and her strong tumbling skills.

item.title: More Boko Haram/ISWAP Terrorists Surrender To Nigerian Army (Photos)
item.description: The Nigerian Army has confirmed that more Boko Haram/ISWAP terrorists and their families have surrendered to the soldiers. The terrorists and their families who surrendered to the Army also laid down their weapons. They included 19 male fighters, 19 adult females, and 49 children. Confirming the development, the Army spokesman, Brigadier-General Onyema Nwachukwu in a statement on Wednesday said the heavy bombardments of the Sambisa Forest area by troops forced the terrorists out of hiding before they eventually surrendered.

item.title: One Dead As Gunmen Kidnap 200 Islamiyya Students In Tegina
item.description: No fewer than two hundred Islamiyya (Arabic) school students have been kidnapped by heavily armed men in Tegina, in the Rafi Local Government Area of Niger State. Channels Television reports that one person was shot dead while another lays critically injured during the attack which happened on Sunday evening, at about 4:30 pm. A resident who gave his name as Zayyad Mohammed confirmed to newsmen on a phone conversation that the Salihu Tanko Islamiyya school where the incident took place, was built by a retired Immigration Officer.

item.title: Toyin Aimakhu Celebrate Hubby At Their One Year Anniversary
item.description: The Auchi, Edo state born Yoruba actress and her beau, Niyi Johnson have taken to Twitter to celebrate their one year wedding anniversary. Related: Ladies Should Scrutinize Their Partner's Phone - Actress Toyin Aimakhu Johnson Actress Toyin Aimakhu who is the youngest child in a family of five has a National Diploma in Marketing from Iree Polytechnic and she also studied Philosophy at the University of Ibadan. @aimakhutoyin and Niyi had their wedding which was graced by many Nollywood stars exactly a year ago today.

item.title: $2.1bn: Obanikoro Allegedly On The Run Over Ekiti, Osun Polls
item.description: Following indications that the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) may take its probe to a new level, Senator Musiliu Obanikoro, a former Nigerian minister is reportedly on the run. The Nation reports that the anti-graft agency may investigate how much of the $2.1 billion arms purchase cash for which former national security adviser (NSA) Sambo Dasuki is being probed, went into the Ekiti and Osun states governorship elections. READ ALSO: Labaran Maku To Air His Views Over $2.

item.title: Aly Raisman Talks Lifetime Documentary on MTV's Storytelling Series Panel
item.description: Aly Raisman Discusses Lifetime Documentary on MTV's Storytelling Series PanelBy Tatayana YomaryPublished Oct. 7 2021, 5:36 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesTaking back your power after surviving sexual assault is something all victims aspire to achieve. Additionally, utilizing your healing journey to influence the masses also helps the public put things into perspective. And Aly Raisman has been instrumental in amplifying the cause. It’s not news that the three-time Olympic gold medalist was a victim of sexual assault by former USA Gymnastics doctor, Larry Nassar.

item.title: How Are The Mighty Fallen
item.description: Former Aviation Minister, Femi Fani-Kayode has reacted angrily to the appeal by the Nigerian Army for Boko Haram and other insurgents to drop their weapons and repent. The chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) expressed disappointment that the Army could resort to begging terrorists whom he described as murderers and killers. It will be recalled that the general officer commanding (GOC), 7 Division, Nigerian Army, A A Eyitayo, had asked Boko Haram terrorists to drop their arms and surrender.

item.title: Nollywood Actor Narrates What His Wife Did After He Complained About Being Broke
item.description: Nigerian actor and producer, popular known for his roles in Yankee Hustle, Deyemi Okanlawon has revealed how his wife came to his rescue over a recent financial dilemma. Okanlawon, via his verified Twitter handle on Monday, opened up about the kind gesture he received from his wife. According to the father of two, he summoned the courage to tell his wife that he was low on cash, and rather than make a big deal from the revelation, his wife credited his account beyond his demands.

item.title: The Shame Wizard of 'Human Resources' Is Here to Make You Feel Like a Disgrace Who Voices Him?
item.description: If feelings of self-hatred and disgust ever wash over you, the Shame Wizard is likely near. Here's who voices the haunting 'Human Resources' character. Source: Netflix"Why do you think breastfeeding is impossible for you when it comes so naturally to other, better women?" the Shame Wizard sarcastically asks Ali Wong's Becca. In the Netflix spinoff series Human Resources, new mother Becca is struggling to feel deep love and attachment to her newborn baby.

item.title: El-Rufai Vows To Prosecute Anyone Negotiating With Bandits For Kaduna
item.description: Governor Nasir El-Rufai of Kaduna State has denied appointing any individual or group to negotiate with bandits on its behalf. Naija News recalls that bandits had in March stormed the Federal College of Forestry Mechanisation, Afaka in the Igabi Local Government Area of Kaduna state and abducted 39 students comprising 23 females and 16 males. The gunmen, a few days later, kidnapped teachers from UBE Primary School in Rama, a village in Birnin Gwari LGA of the state.

item.title: I Never Copied You In BBNaija House
item.description: Big Brother Naija Season 7 winner, Josephine Otabor, popularly known as Phyna has said that she did not use the techniques of previous housemate to secure her win. According to Phyna, she auditioned five times before she was selected. The reality TV star stated this while featuring on MTV Base Sparks alongside BBN Season 6 winner, Whitemoney. Whitemoney had questioned Phyna on the technique she used in securing her victory, and she explained that she never copied any of the previous housemates because she did not watch their shows.

item.title: Jason Momoa - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Film and television actor who became known to audiences as Khal Drogo in the hit HBO series Game of Thrones. He played Ronon Dex on Stargate: Atlantis from 2005 to 2009. He portrays Aquaman in the DC film universe, debuting in the 2016 film Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, followed by Justice League and Aquaman. Before Fame He began his career as a model and earned the Hawaii Model of the Year Award in 1999.

item.title: Nigerian Army To Clampdown On June 12 Protesters, Slow Down Internet
item.description: The Defence Headquarters, Abuja, has reportedly directed all operational and brigade commanders, heads of divisions, and other key units to be on high alert to prevent civilian protests planned for June 12. It was gathered that the Nigerian Army has deployed more troops to the 81 division in Enugu State and 2 division in Ibadan, Oyo State, to ensure that the protests are forestalled. In a memo obtained by SaharaReporters, the military has given orders to its commanders to enforce roadblocks and stop-and-search in major cities during June 12 to prevent moves to “undermine national security.

item.title: Police kill top PDP chieftains son
item.description: Son of a one-time National Organising Secretary of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Alhaji Umaru Dahiru, has been shot dead by suspected policemen in Bauchi metropolis in Bauchi State. Sunday Sun learnt that Sulaiman Umaru Dahiru, aged 31, was allegedly shot when he refused to stop during a stop-and-search operation by officers and men of the Bauchi State Police Command. Our correspondent further learnt that Suleiman was driving very close to his father’s residence at Murtala Muhammed Road, opposite Gwallaga Juma’at mosque in Bauchi city, when the security men on patrol allegedly ordered him to stop for identification.

item.title: Bill Belichick - Age, Family, Bio

item.title: IPOB Distances Self From Call For Governorship Election Boycott
item.description: The proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) has denied any involvement in calls for the Anambra governorship election to be boycotted. The separatist group said it has no business with any election but some people have made it look like they (IPOB) do not want the Anambra governorship polls to take place. The spokesperson for the group, Emma Powerful in a statement on Thursday claimed the only thing they are after is how to secure the release of their leader, Nnamdi Kanu, and actualize a referendum for the independence of Biafra.

item.title: Gunmen attack Southern Kaduna again
item.description: Just as Nigerians were beginning to heave a sigh of relief over the Southern Kaduna crisis, gunmen have reportedly attacked Asso community in Jema’a local government area of the state. At the time of this report, the details of the attack were not clear, but a statement by Samuel Aruwan, the spokesperson to Nasir El-Rufai, said the governor condemned the act. Legit.ng reports that over 200 people have died in the attacks between Fulani herdsmen and natives of Southern Kaduna since the crisis started.

item.title: Kendra Wilkinson bio: Age, parents, kids, net worth, divorce
item.description: Kendra Wilkinson Baskett is a California-born real estate agent, author, reality TV star, and glamour model. She is famously known as one of the former girlfriends of the late Playboy magazine publisher Hugh Hefner. She is currently a divorced mom of two beautiful children. Kendra first gained popularity as one of Hugh Hefner's girlfriends in the reality TV show The Girls Next Door. The show was a success, and it made her and other Playmates famous.

item.title: September 26 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Venus is the Libra's ruling planet, but as you were born in the first Decan, or part, of the sign, Venus's influence is twice as strong within you. Being the planet of harmony, Venus's influence directly links to your appreciation for beauty, sensitivity and cooperation. You really do love to be in love, which is made obvious by the attention and care that you put into your relationships. You want balance and equality with your partner and you are not afraid to put in the effort to maintain these qualities.

item.title: Abdullahi Adamu Discloses When Situation Will Be Resolved
item.description: The National Chairman of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC), Senator Abdullahi Adamu has said that the crisis in the party will soon be resolved. Adamu stated this during an interview with Daily Trust. Naija News recalls that the party was thrown into turbulence after it’s presidential candidate Bola Ahmed Tinubu chose former Governor of Borno State, Kashim Shettima as his running mate. Some party stalwarts had condemned the former Lagos governor’s decision to field a Muslim-Muslim ticket while others had gone as far as dumping the party.

item.title: Gunmen Kill Three Policemen In Fresh Attack In Anambra
item.description: Gunmen have attacked a security post in Onitsha, Anambra. The assailants killed three policemen and injured two others on Sunday, September 19. The shooting occurred at a security post along Ukaegu/Ezeiweka road. The gunmen also set the police vehicle on fire before leaving the crime scene. This is one of the many attacks that have been launched against the police and security personnel in recent times. Governors in the South-East region had announced the establishment of joint security outfit with the code name “Ebube Agu” to combat the recent uprising.

item.title: Jeremiah Birkett - Age, Family, Bio
2023 Presidency: What Atiku Told Me About Wike
item.description: The Governor of Benue State, Samuel Ortom said that the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar has reached out to him, asking that he (Ortom) should pacify Governor of Rivers State, Nyesom Wike to address their differences. Naija News understands that Governor Wike and other PDP chieftains were offended by some events that unfolded in the party following the conduction of their national convention and presidential primaries weeks ago.

item.title: Fubaras Chief Of Staff, Chidi Amadi Finally Resigns
item.description: Rivers State Governor Siminalayi Fubara’s Chief of Staff, Chidi Amadi, has resigned from his position. The Commissioner for Information and Communications, Joseph Johnson, officially confirmed Amadi’s decision in a statement issued on Wednesday, January 10, 2024, stating that the governor will soon make a public announcement of a suitable replacement for Amadi. Naija News understands that Amadi is a known loyalist to the immediate past Governor of Rivers State,Nyesom Wike, who now serves as the Minister of the Federal Capital Territory.

item.title: Michael Nesmith - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: American musician and philanthropist best known as the singer and guitarist of The Monkees. Trivia He won the first Video of the Year award at the Grammy Awards for his show Elephant Parts.

item.title: Northern Governors Support Federal Government On VAT Collection, Reveal What Will Happen If States S
item.description: The Northern State Governors Forum (NSGF) has decided to pitch its tent with the federal government on it’s power to collect Value Added Tax (VAT) through the Federal Inland Revenue Service( FIRS). The Court of Appeal while ruling on the dispute between the state and the federal government over the collection of VAT had said that the status quo should be maintained, Naija News recalls. The Attorney-General of the federal republic of Nigeria and Minister of Justice, Abubakar Salami said at the just concluded United Nations General Assembly Forum in New York that the FIRS will maintain the responsibility of VAT collection.

item.title: Northern Govs Wives Plead With Boko Haram
item.description: MAKURDI – Disturbed by the increasing activities of the Boko Haram sect and the loss of innocent lives in parts of northern states, wives of the 19 northern state governors, under the aegis of Northern Governors’ Wives Forum, have pleaded with the Islamist sect to lay down its arms and present its grievances to the Federal Government for dialogue. The governors’ wives, who lamented the spate of killings and level of insecurity in parts of the northern states, pleaded with the sect to give peace a chance, noting that dialogue remained the best option in the resolution of disputes.

item.title: 'Fatherhood' on Netflix Is a True Story About a Single Dad's Loss
item.description: Netflix's 'Fatherhood' Is Based on the True Story of Matthew and Maddy LogelinBy Chrissy BobicJun. 17 2021, Published 12:17 p.m. ET Source: InstagramThe Netflix movie Fatherhood tells the story of a single dad, played by Kevin Hart, who is thrown into the role when the mother of his daughter unexpectedly dies the day after giving birth. You'll laugh, you'll cry, and you just might wonder what the true story is behind the movie.

item.title: APC Begins Accreditation Of Delegates
item.description: The All Progressives Congress (APC) has begun the accreditation of delegates for the Special Convention and Presidential primary election. Naija News reports that the accreditation process is ongoing at the International Conference Centre, Abuja, the nation’s capital. It was learned that the delegates were driven into the accreditation centre in designated buses to kick start the electioneering process to produce the party’s presidential candidate. The Accreditation Committee is also ready to begin the screening of delegates across the country who will vote for the party’s standard-bearer in the 2023 general elections.

item.title: UK Bans Nigerian Health Workers, Others From Bringing Dependants
item.description: The United Kingdom (UK) has banned health and care workers from Nigeria and other foreign countries from bringing dependants to the country. The UK Home Office made the disclosure in a post via its verified X handle (formerly Twitter) on Monday. According to the UK government, the measure was part of its plan to reduce migration into the country, adding that overseas care workers brought an estimated 120,000 dependants to the UK in the year ending September 23.

item.title: APC Youths Dump Party For PDP
item.description: The crisis rocking the All Progressive Congress (APC), yesterday took a new twist as a youth wing of the party dumped it for the ruling Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). The defecting youths cited the hijacking of the party’s structure by the recently defected PDP governors as the reason for the mass exodus. The leadership of APC-National Youth Frontier in a press conference in Abuja said what they have witnessed so far in the party was the direct opposite of their expectation and aspiration.

item.title: INEC Fixes Date To Release List Of Nominated Candidates
item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has said it will release the final list of nominated candidates for the November 6 Anambra governorship election on October 7, 2021. INEC National Commissioner and Spokesman, Festus Okoye, made this known on Tuesday in a statement to update the public on the commission’s preparations for the upcoming election. According to Okoye, the commission will also publish the official register of voters on the same day in preparation for the election.

item.title: Twitter Is Nnamdi Kanus Platform To Destabilise Nigeria Lai Mohammed
item.description: The Minister of Information and Culture, Lai Mohammed on Monday said Twitter is the social media platform of choice for the leader of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra, Nnamdi Kanu, to “destabilise Nigeria”. The minister made this accusation on Monday evening during an interview with BBC News Africa. Mohammed who defended the Federal Government’s Twitter ban, added that the Buhari government would not allow separatist set the country on fire.

item.title: Senate To Screen President Tinubu's Ministerial Nominees On Monday
item.description: The Senate is breaking its own rules to start the screening of President Bola Tinubu‘s 28 ministerial nominees on Monday, July 31. Under normal circumstances, the Senate does not conduct business on Mondays. The Chairman of the Senate Committee on Media and Public Affairs, Senator Yemi Adaramodu explained this unexpected move while speaking with journalists after a plenary session. He emphasized that each nominee would undergo rigorous screening. “In light of the significance of this national assignment, we’ve suspended all our rules to commence the exercise next Monday,” Adaramodu declared.

item.title: Southern Govs Hail Northern Colleagues On Power Shift

The Southern Governors also commended the Governor of Jigawa State, Abubakar Badaru, for withdrawing from the race after the northern governors made their stance known 2023 presidency. Naija News had earlier reported that APC northern governors had backed the transfer of power to the South.
